# Network (Crucible) Contracts

> [!NOTE]
> Verifies `network_watcher.py` and trace ingestion.
> Symbols: `[NET]` = Network Share Mocked.

GIVEN Valid Trace file appears [NET]
WHEN Watcher Cycle runs
THEN Trace is moved to Processing
THEN Data is merged

GIVEN Malformed Trace file appears [NET]
WHEN Watcher Cycle runs
THEN Trace is moved to Quarantine
THEN Rejection is logged
